about_the_game:
Mucorales is an immersive interactive horror experience, lasting approximately 30 minutes to an hour, inviting you to delve into a dark reinterpretation of the classic Red Riding Hood fairytale. Explore the twisted narrative and witness how your choices shape the story, unraveling hidden secrets within this captivating RPG Maker tale.

Embark on a journey with Blanchette, a young girl visiting her grandma. As she discovers unsettling truths about her and the entire forest, you'll be faced with decisions that could lead her down a path of temptation or guide her to escape the ominous woods.

Engage in conversations with diverse characters, interact with various objects, and witness a chilling story unfold before your eyes. The game offers a unique experience with the opportunity to replay and explore alternative paths, providing fresh perspectives on the narrative each time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support
